role.argrole: thing created by arg0 enwinding each other

example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 而)) (NP-SBJ (NP (NN 竹篙厝)) (CP (WHNP-4 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-TPC (-NONE- *T*-4)) (NP-SBJ (NN 年华)) (VP (VV 老去))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 茶娘))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 则)) (ADVP (AD 依然)) (VP (VP (VV 伴) (AS 著) (NP-OBJ (NN 酒气) (NN 茶香))) (PU ，) (VP (PP (P 和) (NP (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (ADVP (AD 急切)) (VP (VV 渴望) (NP-OBJ (NN 女体) (NN 抚慰))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 寻欢客)))) (PU ，) (VP (VRD (VV 绕缠) (VV 出)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NP-PN (NR 淡水)) (NP (NN 夜晚))) (CP (WHNP-3 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (VA 妖娆)) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 粉味))))))))
example.arg: 竹篙厝 *OP* *T*-4 年华 老去 的 茶娘
和 *OP* *T*-2 急切 渴望 女体 抚慰 的 寻欢客
淡水 夜晚 *OP* *T*-3 妖娆 的 粉味
